website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a traditional piggy bank with a sweet face for an affordable price, this is the one to get.
pros: A glazed ceramic piggy bank in a middle-of-the-road size that fits nicely on shelves
Comes nicely packaged, which makes it ideal for gift giving
cons: Requires handling with care, as it's breakable and quite prone to ear chips

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it will arrive broken,but it arrived in an excellent condition.Verry good packaging and it wasn’t bouncing in the box.The pig looks nice.Now I can store all my coins.Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alyona

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Piggy Bank!
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first one that we had for 2 years, my fault. Just don't carry the case with the pig in it around without holding the bottom.... My son loves it and was devastated that it smashed on the ground. Luckily, Amazon had the exact same one on their website. Since I have Prime it was sent with-in days. Crisis averted!! It is a very nice piggy bank and fairly big!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the polka dot piggy bank. This is the perfect size. It's not too big and not too small. It's easy to add coins to it. It is well-made. It came packaged nicely so if you wanted to give it as a gift it is lovely. I'm thankful I had a gift card to help me with the purchase otherwise I would have been reluctant to purchase it because of the price. I'm a believer that you get what you pay for, but I would rather have less packaging and the piggy bank and a lower price than the price and the piggy bank as it's offered now. Overall I'm pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: KimberliK

customer_reviews.title: Nice, more muted tones and VERY light weight.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute piggy bank. It has multi colored dots, but I would say the dots are a little more muted tones than the photo. It is VERY light weight, I was kind of surprised. I guess that makes it easier for little kids to lift it, but I think it also might mean the walls aren't very thick, so it may break if hit ever so slightly. I have another piggy bank similar to this and it is substantially heavier. All around, I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SnowFan

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE and the perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! It's the perfect size for my son's bookshelf, too! It arrived in an absolutely ADORABLE gift box, so I felt really bad ruining the packaging to open it, as I bought it for my son, not as a gift. If you are going to a baby shower any time soon, I recommend buying this! It's so cute, and everyone will go nuts over it.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a first piggy bank for my young niece so that she can start learning to save money. She really likes the design and is seems to be good quality. My brothers and I will pay her a quarter to run and grab something for us (snacks, drinks) and when she comes to collect she will bring this piggy bank back for her quarters.
customer_reviews.author: bevertooth

customer_reviews.title: So cute and larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable product. My husband had given our granddaughter a piggy bank from our local bank and she cherished it....until she accidentally dropped and broke it. I ordered this as part of her birthday and she loved the much-cuter replacement. It's larger than expected and comes packed well in a very nice round plastic case with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Cute, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 6 year old little brother. It's the perfect size and fits really well on his shelf. Ever since we got it, he's been scavenging for change in the house and outside. It's really nice to see him learning how to do savings.
customer_reviews.author: NancyYEmerald

customer_reviews.title: Polka Dot Piggy Bank is a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so so excited to receive this piggy bank - it was a replacement for one that broke accidentally. This piggy is super-large, so it will hold many coins. We keep it on top of her dresser, so it's not played with on a daily basis, but it does seem very sturdy and not flimsy. I just love the happy polka dots.
customer_reviews.author: DecaturMamaofTwo

customer_reviews.title: Came in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the one my daughter accidentally broke while putting money in it. These piggy banks aren’t cheap. Otherwise she picked out the design. It was cheaper than most of the other ones on amazon. Only negative is it doesn’t fit big half dollar coins in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really BIG pig!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! Way bigger than expected or described. Great customer service however. They refunded my money and did not ask me to return it. Guess I'll try to give it away. Too big to place on a table in our son's room. If he attempted to pick it up or add money to it, it would drop and break.
customer_reviews.author: MomArtist

customer_reviews.title: May come with crooked eyes
customer_reviews.text: Love the piggy bank in general but the eyes were painted on lopsided. One eye was higher than the other making him look crazy. The piggy bank came packaged with a toys r us invoice in the box so I was able to easily exchange it in toys r us store for a new one with perfect eyes. Id say 5 stars for item itself if perfect but 3 for product control and I had to take time to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshoppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: My two-year old son loves collecting change and gets excited every time we tell him to get his piggy bank. It is made of a sturdy ceramic and has a nice pastel blue finish. The eyes and mouth feature aren't put on with the greatest of care, not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.RichRich

customer_reviews.title: Great little pig that comes in an awesome packaging
customer_reviews.text: What a cute little blue piggy bank! It comes in a very nice cylindrical box, actually quite impressive packaging. My daughter loved it immediately. You can fit up to a Kennedy in it and you can empty your change on the bottom. Not a nick, chip, scratch on the ceramic pig. Great presentation, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cheung

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate the plug which can be decently easy to remove to get the coins out
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as described and was sturdier than I was expecting. I appreciate the plug which can be decently easy to remove to get the coins out. Some smaller coins can get trapped in the pigs' legs, so you do need to shake it a bit to get everything out.
customer_reviews.author: akleyn

customer_reviews.title: Tiny piggy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 3 year old son. He loves it because it is so tiny that he can carry it around in his hand. It's about the size of a softball.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I had to buy my son the blue one! They love feeding the pigs with coins!
customer_reviews.author: G. Laqui

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Piggy Bank
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING piggy bank! It's very large and has a good weight to it. The colors are bright and adorable! There is a small plastic plug on the bottom, so NO need to smash poor piggy when she's full. My daughter LOVED her when she arrived and we immediately filled her with small change we had around the house. A great place for your little one's money.
customer_reviews.author: APSc

customer_reviews.title: super cute, a little smaller than a soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: super cute, a little smaller than a soccer ball. The rubber plug comes out fairly easily and goes back with a little finagling. Pretty much does what it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Bruner

customer_reviews.title: but I love it. Now I just need to find enough ...
customer_reviews.text: This was much larger than I expected, but I love it. Now I just need to find enough money to fill it up!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie H.

customer_reviews.title: cute bank and good size
customer_reviews.text: large size bank good price would tell anyone to purchase one the new guidelines for customer reviews are a little strang I can't go into raptures over a piggy bank
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comes on a very nice clear round box with a handle. Great baby shower gift and good quality
customer_reviews.author: sdughug

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my nephew. I had planned on buying something else but as soon as I saw this I changed my plans. Piggy comes in a round see-through gift box.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really like the piggy I wanted to get one i got exactly for my daughter but in blue for our son it was more expensive here then when i had bought it instore but not too bad since I couldn’t find it in stores anymore it was worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Piggy Bank cuteness
customer_reviews.text: These piggy banks are so cute. This is my second one ordered. This one came in a clear bag with packaging to keep it from breaking. It arrived quickly too.I was able to just transfer the piggy bank to a cute bag. The bank was a baby shower gift. It's just a happy looking keepsake for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Price is fake ....sudden raise from 11$ to $20 in three month
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for $11 3 month back...& the price for same product is $ 20... Very much disappointed...piggy bank is cute & good large size
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: A perfect welcome to my grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect and packaged in an extremely well protected manner. Also, it arrived ahead of the promised date. The bank is really very cute and, along with the pink one, were the perfect welcome to my new twin grandkids. You won't go wrong by ordering these piggy banks.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I arlready had one but it is full so I decided to give it a companion.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piggy bank. The bank itself is bigger than you think and comes in a beautifully round box, similar to an old fashioned hat box. I bought 2 of these for my nephews and they both loved it. Great way to teach them to save money they receive as gifts or to save any loose change they find. The piggy bank is adorable and looks great in the kids room or on any shelf/mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great bank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for staging - super cute but chips easily!
customer_reviews.text: This piggy bank is very cute and is a great size... exactly what I wanted. ...But the finish chips so easily! I've already found numerous chips on the ear and snout just a day after it was given. If you give this to a child, plan on it being up and out of the way of a child's reach... pretty much immediately after it's opened. Amazon did a great job shipping this fragile item.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality :(
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality :( Glad I didn’t buy as a gift. Bought for my own daughter to replace her old bank that broke. Opened it up and it had little bits of plastic adhered all over it (likely from the the spots were placed - they are decals, not painted on). Also, there was an obvious bubble in the glaze in one spot that looked really bad. I didn’t even show bank to my daughter - just packed it back up and returned it. Would have been embarrassed to give such a poor quality item as a gift. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic Piggy Bank..blue by Pearhead
customer_reviews.text: This piggy bank is even cuter in person, and a quality piggy. We have a pregnant daughter in law and we have been putting all our loose change in it (a tradition my parents started) and after baby arrives, the bank is given to new parents to buy something for the baby. The baby is a boy...so mistaking this is a very blue pig (again better than picture) and he holds a lot of change, more than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gaely

product_meta.title: Pearhead Ceramic Piggy Bank, Nursery Decor, Holiday Present, Savings Coin Bank For Kids, Blue
product_meta.description:
Style:BlueThis little Pearhead piggy bank didn't go to the market. He's right at home with you, making sure your little ones are starting to save early! Kids will love placing money in their new piggy bank friend and watching their savings grow. This ceramic bank is the perfect pastel blue. Ceramic piggy bank is the perfect nursery decoration for any baby boy nursery. This adorable little bank sits perfectly on any table or book shelf. It has a rubber stopper holding in all your savings. When your little one needs to open the bank for a little fun, the rubber stopper is easy to remove. This bank also makes for a great baby shower gift! It’s included in the cutest gift box packaging and includes a ribbon bow. Add Pearhead’s adorable piggy bank to your boy’s nursery and have fun saving over the years! Product dimensions: 5” W x 6.250” H x 7” D

Thinking of baby registry ideas? You can't go wrong with this whimsical piggy bank that just begs to be added to your baby wish list. Not expecting a little angel of your own? No problem, this classic keepsake bank is just the thing for your next baby shower gift.

At Pearhead, we aim to create genuine, quality products to celebrate your special moments in life. We are a family of designers, marketers, and trendsetters bringing products to life that will bring a smile to your face. From concept and design to production and customer service, the Pearhead team works together seamlessly every step of the way. Whether your baby is celebrating their first year of life, you are announcing your pregnancy, or your pup is celebrating his first holiday season, Pearhead is here to share your moments in style. Packaging Dimensions: 8.25" L x 7.25" W x 8.25" D. Product Dimensions: 5" L x 6.25" W x 7" D.
feature_bullets: Glazed ceramic bank is perfect for any nursey or kid's room
Large enough to hold your little pearhead's savings
Removable rubber stopper holds in savings
Your piggy is decoratively wrapped with a ribbon handle making for the perfect gift
A sweet gift for any expecting or new parent
Saving is fun with this classic ceramic piggy bank
An adorable way to save your baby's first coins

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars280 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
